definition: to repair/to fix/to prune/to trim/(coll.) to sort sb out/to fix sb
dried meat/private teacher's remuneration/withered/variant of 修[xiu1]
to decorate/to embellish/to repair/to build/to write/to cultivate/to study/to take (a class)
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up

sentences.english: I got a job as the automotive internist.
sentences.chinese: 我得到了一份汽车修理工的工作。

sentences.english: The water was shut off for several hours while the plumber repaired the pipes.
sentences.chinese: 管子工修理管道时，水的供应中断了几个小时。

sentences.english: That building being repaired is our dormitory.
sentences.chinese: 现在修理的那座楼是我们的宿舍。

sentences.english: Costs of repairs may be reimbursed.

sentences.chinese: 以我的汽车修理师为例吧。

sentences.english: Your watch will be repaired free if it is still under guarantee.
sentences.chinese: 你的手表在保修期内可享受免费修理。

sentences.english: The Jordache garage was on the outskirts of town, so they got a lot of transient traffic.
sentences.chinese: 乔达虚汽车修理厂位于市郊，那里过往车辆很多。

sentences.english: You ought to read these books if you want to know how to repair the motorcar.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想知道如何修理汽车，你应该读这些书。

sentences.english: He drew an axis on it first then fixed it carefully.
sentences.chinese: 他首先在发电机上画了一条轴线然后仔细修理起来。

sentences.english: More than 2 years in engine and vehicles test or repaire, service or manufacture operating job .
sentences.chinese: 两年以上发动机和车辆试验或修理，服务，制造经验。

sentences.english: It's no surprise that computer repair companies are thriving.
sentences.chinese: 电脑修理业繁荣起来就不足为怪了。

sentences.english: You can use it repair a leaky toilet, or to fix a crack on a toilet seat.
sentences.chinese: 可以用它修补漏水的马桶，修理马桶座圈的裂缝。

sentences.english: Repair leaking water pipe in starboard deck.
The repairman apologized and threwthe bike in the back of his truck.
sentences.chinese: 修理工到了歉，把自行车放到卡车后面。

sentences.english: repair your castle with your repairman
sentences.chinese: 利用修理工修理你的城堡。

sentences.english: repair your castle with your repairman
sentences.chinese: 利用修理工修理你的城堡。

definition: to repair (sth broken)/to restore (sth damaged)/to establish friendly relations with/(literary) to do meritorious deeds
to repair/to refurbish/to renovate/to refit/to mend/to rebuild
to overhaul/to examine and fix (a motor)/to service (a vehicle)
to spruce up/to renovate/to tend (a garden)/to groom (one's hair)/to finish (a rough surface)/to trim (a lawn)/to touch up (a photo)
to change one's costume/to repackage/to remodel/to refit/to modify/to convert
